item.title: EA Sports College Basketball announcement teased
item.content:encoded:
Electronic Arts has teased the return of its college basketball games with a new tweet from the EA Sports Twitter account today.

The tweet reads, “Bring the Madness. Let’s run it back. #CBB #ItsInTheGame.”

Electronic Arts regularly released college basketball games from 1998 to 2009, with the NCAA March Madness series from 1998 to 2007, and the NCAA Basketball series from 2008 to 2009.

Going by the tweet, the series will likely return under the name EA Sports College Basketball, much like Electronic Arts’ EA Sports College Football revival.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/ea-sports-college-basketball-announcement-teased
